docs.lead_paragraph: COMMISSIONERS OF HEALTH.--The second regular meeting of the Board of Health was held at 12 o'clock on Wednesday noon, in the Library Room, City Hall. Present--Jonas N. Philips, Esq., John Clancy, Esq., Richard H. Thompson, M. D., Jedediah Miller, M. D., Wm. Rockwell, M. D., and George W Morton, Esq.

headline.main: Late and Important from the Mormon Country.; ARRIVAL OF THE SALT LAKE MAIL.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Western mail of last evening brought us the Beseret Notes of the 20th and 27th of May, from which we make up a summary of what is transpiring in that quarter. The usual number of sermons, or "Remarks," as they are called, of the leading men of the Mormon faith, are contained in each of these papers fromwhich we may hereafter give some extracts.

headline.main: LAW INTELLIGENCE,; COURT OF GENERAL SESSIONS. Judge Russell Before the Grand Jury--He Charges that Body in an Original Manner. COURT OF SPECIAL SESSIONS. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS-

docs.lead_paragraph: Before Judge Russell. Shortly after the opening of the Court yesterday, the following gentlemen were impanneled as Grand Jurors: MARCELLUS ELLS, Foreman. Benjamin Archer, Geo R. Andrews, Michael Crystal, Andrew Dimock, Jeo. R. Lawrence, Theo. A. Meyer, John W. Miller, Wm. F. Mott, Jr. John D Secor. F. E. Townsend, Jao. Buckley, Jr., Benj. T. Babbitt, Paul A. Onrtis, Francis Leland. George. A. Platt.

headline.main: LETTERS FROM OVER THE SEA.; NUMBER THREE.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Cunard steamship Arabia, with three days later news from Europe, arrived at this port last evening. It is staled that the shipping of the Submarine Cable, on board the Niagara, was to have been commenced on the 29th ultimo. The dispute between Spain and Mexico looks very threatening at the present time, and we have reliable information that the Mexican Envoy was preparing to

headline.main: THE GREAT WEST--No. II.; The Mountain Formation of North America--The Great Table-Lands--Geographical Features.

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor of the New-York Daily Times: I have, in a former note, given you a sketch of one of the cardinal subdivisions of our continent and country, the GREAT PLAINS. I now proceed to sketch what is beyond them, and fills the space out to the Pacific sea. This is the immenseMOUNTAIN FORMATION oF NORTH AMERICA.

docs.lead_paragraph: Cow-Stables in the City--Where Orange County Milk is Made. At the last meeting of the Brooklyn Common Council, Alderman RUSSELL presented a petition from John T. Hildreth and others, praying that the resolution adopted at the previous meeting, permitting Mr Husted to rebuild the cow-stables attached to his distiliery, back of the Wallabout, might be revoked.
